name: Bomber Battle
description:
Bomber Battle is a clone inspired by a well-known and loved 1983 game whose beginnings took place on the MSX platform, and has since spread around the world in numerous versions.

In this incarnation, the gameplay is all geared towards two players in battle mode, while maintaining MSX 1 compatibility plus a modern and fun melody.

Written in MSX BASIC and compiled with MSXBAS2ROM, this is a MSX 1 compatible game. Donate to this game and you will help us to support the MSXBAS2ROM compiler project!
